Package entity

Class Employee

java.lang.Object
entity.Employee
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEmployee
public class Employee extends Object implements IEmployee
Represents an employee.
Proposes employee attributes and exposes methods to manage an employee.
Employee has methods to get and set employees informations and methods and attributes to check if an employee is valid or not
Since:
2023

  • Constructor Details

    • Employee

      public Employee(int registrationNumber, String lastname, String firstname, char gender, String birthdate, String mailAddress, byte[] picture, String username, String password, String function)
      A constructor of employee
      Parameters:
      registrationNumber - is the registration number of the employee
      lastname - is his lastname
      firstname - is his firstname(s)
      gender - is his gender: 'M' or 'F'
      birthdate - is his birthdate with the format YYYY-MM-dd
      mailAddress - is his mail address
      picture - represents the eventual picture
      username - is the username of the employee
      password - : his password
      function - is his function

    • Employee

      public Employee(int registrationNumber, String lastname, String firstname, char gender, String birthdate, String mailAddress, String username, String password, String function)

      Parameters:
      registrationNumber - is the registration number of the employee
      lastname - is his lastname
      firstname - is his firstname(s)
      gender - is his gender: 'M' or 'F'
      birthdate - is his birthdate with the format YYYY-MM-dd
      mailAddress - is his mail address
      username - is the username of the employee
      password - : his password
      function - is his function
